original_text: And the king made silver as common in Jerusalem as stone, and he made cedar as plentiful as the sycamore of the Shephelah.
korean_text: 왕이 예루살렘에서 은을 돌 같이 흔하게 하고 백향목을 평지의 뽕나무 같이 많게 하였더라

sentences.original_text: And the king made silver as common in Jerusalem as stone
sentences.korean_translation: 왕은 예루살렘에서 은을 돌처럼 흔하게 만들었고

sentences.original_text: and he made cedar as plentiful as the sycamore of the Shephelah
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 세펠라의 뽕나무처럼 백향목을 풍성하게 만들었습니다
